name: Virti
slogan: Virti is an immersive, enterprise learning solution for healthcare and beyond
description:
Virti is an immersive, enterprise learning solution for healthcare and beyond. Virti allows for creation and cross-platform distribution of interactive, immersive (VR, AR and MR) educational content and provides analytics that intelligently predict how a user will perform under pressure before entering a real environment.
Virti uses research into cognitive decision-making under pressure and an immersive video platform combined with augmented reality to help professionals prepare for real-life high-pressure environments including surgery, sports, emergency response and military training.

? Winner Royal College of Surgeons Edinburgh Triennial Surgical Innovation Award
? Winner Association of Medical Education Technology, Innovation & Excellence Award
? Winner Association of Medical Education Technology Enhanced Learning Award
? Winner SimGHOSTS Best Innovation Award
? Winner VR Awards VR Healthcare
? Winner Mayor of London Medtech Award
? Virti In The News: VRFocus, UploadVR & HTN

jobs.title: Business Development Lead West Coast
jobs.description:
Virti offers an end-to-end, multi-award-winning VR/AR-based immersive learning platform that improves how people train, learn and perform in healthcare and beyond. With a mission to elevate performance through immersive experience, we are shaping the future of learning for employees and healthcare professionals.

The opportunity
We are expanding fast and are rolling out to a number of healthcare providers in California and Texas and are looking for a proactive, smart  Business Development Lead for Los Angeles and the West Coast to expand our accounts and grow new markets.

The role
As the primary Sales person for the West Coast you will maximise existing healthcare account revenues as well as generating and closing deals in your own new clients. Working with C-suite clients and key executive sponsors in early adopters, you’ll be a trusted client advisor driving complex sales to their conclusion, seeding a new and highly disruptive market of immersive training. 

As BD you will own planning the strategy for the California territory, building a sales team to execute your vision across faster-moving markets such as the pharmaceutical and training providers.
You will assist your team in managing the complexity of an exciting, game-changing solution sale.

A successful first 6 months will involve:

Delivering upwards of $200k in revenue per quarter.
Mapping out new markets and building them into a sales strategy.
Devising a lead-generation strategy.
Building a sales team to deliver your vision.

The key skills you’ll need in order to be successful:

Extensive experience selling SaaS or PaaS and exceeding sales goals.
Proven experience building a team of sales people and lead gen, helping them to fulfil and outperform their sales quotas.
Ability to accurately forecast and achieve monthly and quarterly commitments.

Behaviours that suit our culture:

Comfort with ambiguous or changing circumstances, a typical facet of start-up life.
Suggesting solutions to problems and owning their resolution.
Mentoring, developing, and collaborating with a high-performing team.
Able to work independently in California initially
Self-belief, understanding and allowing for the highs and lows that come with solution selling.

Things it may help you to know:

Any experience of medical devices and/or medical training will be advantageous.
Prior experience selling into either the pharmaceutical or edtech spaces is highly desirable.

Virti is committed to building as diverse a team as possible. We do not discriminate based on age, race, gender identification, sexuality, religion, political persuasion or anything else.
